name: Insalata Tricolore
author: devilsdancefloor
summary: When I was in Italy, I ate this as much as possible. It's so easy and so delicious. Perfect as a starter for entertaining or a simple lunch. Have some ciabatta bread and olive oil on the side for dipping.
ingredients: 1 large ripe beefsteak tomato, cut into 6 slices
1 large ball of fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced
extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling
directions: Arrange tomato slices on a serving platter
Lay 1 avocado slice on top of each tomato, and top with fresh mozzarella
Drizzle olive oil, then balsamic vinegar over the tops, and season with salt and pepper
